 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹ֫הַר‎</span> **noun masculine** ==purchase-price== of wife **(** Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 78 f</sup>; [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Proph. iv. n. 13</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l.c.</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>Geschichte. i. 381</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Deut.22.23|Deut 22:23]] and references</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מוֺהֲרָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">**)**; — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Gen.34.12|Gen 34:12]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַתָּן‎</span>) [[1Sam.18.25|1Sam 18:25]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹהַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבְּתוּלֹת‎</span> [[Exod.22.16|Exod 22:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]).
